text: Bathysciadium is a genus of sea snails, deep-sea limpets, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Bathysciadiidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Bathysciadium include: * Bathysciadium concentricum Dall, 1927Rosenberg, G. (2010). Bathysciadium concentricum Dall, 1927. In: Bouchet, P.; Gofas, S.; Rosenberg, G. (2010) World Marine Mollusca database. Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=532436 on 2011-06-07 * Bathysciadium costulatum (Locard, 1898) * Bathysciadium pacificum Dall, 1908Bouchet, P. (2010). Bathysciadium pacificum Dall, 1908. Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=512111 on 2011-06-07 * Bathysciadium rotundum (Dall, 1927)Rosenberg, G. (2010). Bathysciadium rotundum (Dall, 1927). In: Bouchet, P.; Gofas, S.; Rosenberg, G. (2010) World Marine Mollusca database. Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=532437 on 2011-06-07 * Bathysciadium xylophagum Warén & Carrozzza in Warén, 1997 ==References== ==External links== Category:Bathysciadiidae Category:Gastropod genera
